name: MakeAllDotsBlack
description:
MakeAllDotsBlack

Aim of the game : All the Dots should be equidistant to each other to progress in the game

USP of the game

1) relaxing music

2) tricky puzzles 

3)infinite levels 

4)Unique Art StyleThis game is for PB Game Jam 5 

Theme: taken is" out of reach" and "redo"
